mapper.select: update INSBSupplement set keyid = #{keyid},providerid = #{providerid},ruleid = #{ruleid},metadataName = #{metadataName},metadataValueKey = #{metadataValueKey},metadataValue = #{metadataValue},taskid = #{taskid},optime = #{optime},opuser = #{opuser} where id = #{id}

update INSBSupplement set keyid = #{keyid}, providerid = #{providerid}, metadataValueKey = #{metadataValueKey}, taskid = #{taskid},optime = #{optime},opuser = #{opuser} where keyid = #{keyid} and providerid = #{providerid} and taskid = #{taskid}
